findings.title: PVC - Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: The contract accumulates tokens from taxes to swap them for ETH, but the variable `numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity` can trigger a huge amount of token swaps, leading to significant price volatility due to token price fluctuations.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity and overhead, increasing gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: The contract is using variables that initialize them only in the constructor and are not mutated by other functions, but these variables are not defined as `immutable`.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not adhere to the Solidity style guide's naming conventions, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are a way to record and log information about changes or actions that occur within a contract.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, and can also increase the size of the contract and the cost of deploying and interacting with it.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables configured by user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values, leading to potential problems during execution.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Using assembly can be error-prone and requires careful testing and debugging to ensure correctness.
